onboard_welcome_intro:
My Strengths is a simple way of taking note of 
what you're proud of 
what went well, 
good things
onboard_welcome_intro2: The App reminds you of the things you've done well helping you celebrate victories, big or small
onboard_welcome_para: To get started, enter your name to receive personalised notifications
onboard_eplain_swipe:
Swipe right on Entries to edit them 
Swipe left on Entries to delete them 
See how this works below
onboard_example_entry: Today I went to the gym
name: Name
